sentences: Ta ütles, et see on vaja selle saamiseks.
Meil on vaja veel üht dokumenti selleks, et see õnnestuks saamiseks.
context: The word 'saamiseks' in Estonian means 'in order to get' or 'to obtain', and it is commonly used to indicate the purpose of an action, as in English 'in order to' or 'so that'.
